movies.title: Captain Phillips
movies.plot: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the US-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.
movies.awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 146 nominations.

events.title: Richard Philips leaves home to captain a cargo ship
Somali pirates attempt to catch up to the Maersk Alabama cargo ship
Somali pirates take over the Maersk Alabama cargo ship

movies.title: Black Hawk Down
movies.plot: When U.S. Rangers and an elite Delta Force team attempt to kidnap two underlings of a Somali warlord, their Black Hawk helicopters are shot down, and the Americans suffer heavy casualties, facing intense fighting from the militia on the ground.
